usefulItems: baking sheet, parchment paper, paper towel, oven
title: Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms

ingredients.content: 6 oz fennel, trimmed, cored, cubed, fronds reserved to garnish
16 oz ground pork sausage, broken into pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment and set aside.
Place Parmesan cheese, panko and thyme into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Remove mushroom stems (reserve 3 oz.). With a small spoon, scoop out the mushrooms gills and discard. Wipe down mushroom caps with a damp paper towel and set aside.

Place fennel, onion, 3 oz reserved mushroom stems, garlic, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and without measuring cup sauté <b>9 min/250°F/speed <b>.
Add sausage, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>6 min/195°F//speed 0.5<b>.
Add cream cheese and ⅔ of the reserved Parmesan mixture, insert measuring cup and mix <b>1 min//speed 0.5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix a further <b>1 min//speed 0.5<b>.

Divide the sausage mixture between prepared mushroom caps (approx. 1 oz ea.) and place on prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle mushrooms with remaining Parmesan mixture. Bake for 20 minutes (400°F) or until tops are lightly browned. Garnish with fennel fronds and serve warm.
